title: Prepare a Broker Opinion of Value (BOV)
description: A property owner wants to know the current market value of their small office building. They ask a commercial agent to prepare a BOV.

tasks.description: Gather information on the subject property, including its size, income, and expenses.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent has all necessary data on the property being valued.

tasks.description: Research and select at least three recent, relevant sales comparables.
tasks.expected_outcome: A list of strong comparable sales is compiled.

tasks.description: Analyze the property using both the income approach (cap rate) and the sales comparison approach to arrive at a final value estimate.
tasks.expected_outcome: The agent uses multiple valuation methods to determine a credible value.

tasks.description: Generate a professional BOV report detailing the analysis and present it to the owner.
tasks.expected_outcome: The owner receives a comprehensive report explaining the property's estimated value.
